拍.definition: to pat; to clap; to slap; to swat; to take (a photo); to shoot (a film); racket (sports); beat (music)

拍出.definition: to sell at auction; to reach a given price at auction

拍婆子.definition: to chase girls; to hang around with girls

拍客.definition: citizen journalist (typically posting short, self-produced documentary videos on the Web)

拍岸.definition: to beat against the shore (of waves)

拍打.definition: to pat; to slap; (of a bird) to flap (one's wings)

拍拍屁股走人.pinyin: pāi pāi pì gǔ zǒu rén
拍拍屁股走人.definition: to make oneself scarce; to slip away; to take French leave

拍攝.definition: to take (a picture); to shoot (a film)

拍板.definition: clapper-board; auctioneer's hammer; to beat time with clappers

拍案.definition: lit. to slap the table (in amazement, praise, anger, resentment etc); fig. astonishing!, wonderful!, dreadful! etc

拍案叫絕.definition: lit. slap the table and shout with praise (idiom); fig. wonderful!; amazing!; great!

拍案而起.definition: (idiom) to slam the table and rise to one's feet in indignation

拍案驚奇.definition: to slap the table in amazement (idiom); wonderful!; amazing!

拍演.definition: (dialect) to perform; to act (in a play etc)

拍片.definition: to shoot a film; to have a medical imaging procedure

拍磚.definition: (slang) to throw brickbats; to criticize harshly

拍謝.definition: (Tw) excuse me; to be sorry; apologetic; embarrassed; shy (from Taiwanese 歹勢, Tai-lo pr. [pháinn-sè]) (also sometimes written as 歹勢 in Mandarin)

拍賣.definition: to auction; auction sale; to sell at a reduced price

拍馬.definition: to urge on a horse by patting its bottom; fig. to encourage; same as 拍馬屁|拍马屁, to flatter or toady

拍馬屁.definition: to flatter; to fawn on; to butter sb up; toadying; bootlicking
